title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / vicquemare esprit afterthought
description: What a hell... *are* we from the same station?

dialogueTree.title: Esprit de Corps: "Okay, the man with the sunglasses a..."
dialogueTree.text: Okay, the man with the sunglasses and his *hypothetical Station 41*. Weird, right?

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "There's something we're missing her..."
links.text: There's something we're missing here... something you can't put our finger on. You know what -- just ask him. I know it sounds crazy (and you'll probably get laughed at). But still...

links.title: You: "I was thinking the same thing. I sh..."
links.text: I was thinking the same thing. I should just ask him if we're from the same station.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Yes. Just cross it off the list. It..."
links.text: Yes. Just cross it off the list. It's probably not true though.

links.title: You: "It's impossible. I don't want to wa..."
links.text: It's impossible. I don't want to waste my time.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Of course. Yes. It's preposterous."
You: "I guess it was kind of weird, yes."
links.text: I guess it was kind of weird, yes.

links.title: You: "No, this whole interaction was perf..."
links.text: No, this whole interaction was perfectly normal.

links.title: You: "Frankly I'm way past caring or wond..."
links.text: Frankly I'm way past caring or wondering. [Discard thought.]
